phase3.color.RGBColor



class RGBColor;
This is a color represented by a red, green, and blue value.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 9, 2014

this();
Creates an RGBColor with 0 as the red, green, and blue values.

Date:
April 9, 2014

this(ubyte red, ubyte green, ubyte blue);
Creates an RGBColor.

Params:
ubyte red The red value.
ubyte green The green value.
ubyte blue The blue value.

Date:
April 9, 2014

ubyte getRed();
Returns:
This RGBColor's red value.

Date:
April 15, 2014

ubyte getGreen();
Returns:
This RGBColor's green value.

Date:
April 15, 2014

ubyte getBlue();
Returns:
This RGBColor's blue value.

Date:
April 15, 2014

HSLColor toHSLColor();
Converts this RGBColor to an HSLColor.

See Also:
Converting Between HSL & RGB

Date:
April 9, 2014
